name: Medium Lightning Elemental
resistance: acid, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
conimmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Lightning
traits.desc: A creature that touches the lightning elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) lightning damage.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
traits.desc: For every 5 feet that the lightning elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lightning elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (7d8 + 5) lightning damage.

actions.name: Globe Lightning (1/Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The lightning elemental discharges 3 globes of electricity that hover in its space for 1 minute. Whenever a creature enters or starts its turn within 5 feet of the elemental, one of the globes discharges. The target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (1d8 + 5) lightning damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one. As each globe discharges, it disappears.
